metadata.title: CVE-2023-45233 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
EDK2's Network Package is susceptible to an infinite lop vulnerability whenparsing a PadN option in the Destination Options header of IPv6. Thisvulnerability can be exploited by an attacker to gain unauthorized accessand potentially lead to a loss of Availability.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-45233` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ovmf - 0~20191122.bd85bf54-2ubuntu3.5
qemu-efi - 0~20191122.bd85bf54-2ubuntu3.5
qemu-efi-aarch64 - 0~20191122.bd85bf54-2ubuntu3.5
qemu-efi-arm - 0~20191122.bd85bf54-2ubuntu3.5
No subscription required

criterions.comment: edk2 package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0~20191122.bd85bf54-2ubuntu3.5').
